## AppliedQueryFilter interface

A filter that the Answers API applied to the search.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AppliedQueryFilter 
```

|  [displayKey](./answers-core.appliedqueryfilter.displaykey.md) | string | The display name of the filter key. |
